careers.title: HVAC Technician
careers.whyThis: This career is connected to the science areas you’ve been learning. You still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more on Physical Sciences. We relaxed the rules to show this career to you now.

careers.title: Microbiology Technician
careers.whyThis: This career is connected to the science areas you’ve been learning. You still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more on Biological Sciences. We relaxed the rules to show this career to you now.

careers.whyThis: This career is connected to the science areas you’ve been learning. You still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more on Biological Sciences. We relaxed the rules to show this career to you now.
